title: Yasuo is winning the VS event... will you stand for this?
body:
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XTFnMlDXclM/WTWRFJNyPrI/AAAAAAABD1c/ovIuUAyhjhsOBusKRacEmf844qov8D7EQCLcB/s1920/18836716_1432258293487797_6045970629852047100_o.jpg

Equip your order icons and lets bury the swordsman once and for all. Let's finish what 10 bans started.

replies.body: "Let's finish what 10 bans started" I've never laughed so hard XD
I think we sincerely have a battlecry now. That's amazing.
I won't downvote his Light-Loving booty just because of that line lmao
omg i will use this every time in game now xD to motivate my team
Holy shit that line got me

Oh, I thought Riven was winning.

Fuck.
I don't even know where to check, but HA :p
On the client and go to the Vs. section. You will see a bar.
that bar only became active today. As far as i have been aware it used to just be an image.
oh thank god, I remember seeing this bar yesterday and people were claiming Riven had a very slight lead
she did :(
heheheh >:)

"Let's finish what 10 bans started"

... I've decided not to downvote thread just because of this line.
I find it hard to believe Yasuo is winning because my friends list is seemingly filled with nothing but Riven icons.
Same, tbh, first day I was thinking "oh good, Riven's winning, everyone playing her". Guess not.

It's because there's people like me who are ashamed to choose Yasuo so they just equip the icons for a brief moment to then switch back to something else, just to get that chance for soul stealer Vayne from the orbs.

We're selfish bastards we know but sometimes it has to be done.

> [{quoted}](name=DunkinNoobs,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aXTAEVhE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-06-20T05:57:03.122+0000)
>
> I find it hard to believe Yasuo is winning because my friends list is seemingly filled with nothing but Riven icons.

Opposite for me.
This VS event is a lose-lose situation no matter which side wins, a giant douch VS a shit danish, Cancer VS AIDS, Donald VS Hillary.
if only the presidential race was a death match with giant swords
wallbringer trump skin OP AF
Build a Wall! Don't let the Yasuos in. Riven can just wall hop.
Yasuo can use Riven to slide through the wall, though.
Yasuo can use any champion to go through the wall........
Lets be honest, riven is just a stronger yasuo
if there are minions, it's skill matchup. If there are no minions then it's a slaughter.
Riven can destroy yasuo because he has no defensive mobility, riven can engage and disengage, yasuo can only engage
If there are flashes then riven one shots without counterplay
This event is pretty fun. Seeing all those Yasuo icons in my friendslist made it easier to finally sort it out :^)

I much prefer the order Icon aswell q.q

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/226151430732513281/326529807904931875/Screenshot_895.png

You know what. I prefer the order icon as well.
But I won't use either of them anyway. And this is about a principle: Chaos shall reign the world!
No it won't.  Chaos won't rule the world because that in itself is some kind of rule.  Goes against what chaos might stand for; itself!
Order doesn't want allies, she wants slaves.

{{champion:92}} Mains: annoying.
{{champion:157}} Mains: annoying.

Doesn't matter to me. Chaos theme is more my style ({{champion:266}}) so that's the only reason
This event is only lose-lose situation
I joined order because I HATE yas and yas mains with a passon.. plus Gotta please that booty..
Chaos is progress, because progress means change. Order will only keep things the same and stifle the questions that lead to progress.

Riven is literally 
"Progress under a steadfast sky."

Yasuo is not progress, he plans on destroying everything... that is not progress it is regression.
If the world is corrupted to its core, destroying everything and reboot can be progress as well.

Just logged in and saw this:
http://imgur.com/a/aPTx6
Color me puzzled.
That graph is a bit confusing. Does that mean that Chaos or Order is winning?
It means that Chaos is winning

I'm real annoyed that they decided to get the slider working toward the end of the event. I was under the assumption it was even.

Also, 10 bans is not doing shit. Go into Blind and beat the crap out of the Yasuos as Riven. That will help gather points faster.

EDIT: I did a stupid. The event is longer than I thought. 

WE HAVE TIME.

FUCK ORDER.

FUCK CHAOS.

JOIN THE GLORIOUS AND ALMIGHTY RENGAR MASTER RACE.
If there is ever going to be a Kha'Zix vs Rengar event, I will make sure that Kha is winning.
Quality gameplay post
Foolish OP, you face not just Weebs alone, but the legions of Neckbeard.

Chaos > Order. 

(IRL I'd support Order but hey! It's Yasuo so order it is!)

Yes, we will stand for it and WE WILL PLAY FOR CHAOS!!!! Everything is Chaos, the universe itself is CHAOS! Order is nothing but a construct of a sentient mind that wants to dominate other beings, sentient or not. Chaos rules and Chaos will win. Although i don't agree with the Demonic depiction of chaos, making chaos look evil when it's not. Oh well, i support Chaos in general, not Riot's depiction of it.

> Yasuo is winning the VS event... will you stand for this?

Uhm... yes.
I want Soulstealer Vayne so bad, or at least a chance to get the skin.
